org.jaudiotagger.tag

Interface TagTextField

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TagField
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractID3v2Frame, AsfTagTextField, ID3v1TagField, ID3v22Frame, ID3v23Frame, ID3v24Frame, Mp4DiscNoField, Mp4GenreField, Mp4TagByteField, Mp4TagReverseDnsField, Mp4TagTextField, Mp4TagTextNumberField, Mp4TrackField, VorbisCommentTagField

    public interface TagTextField
extends TagField
    This interface extends the default field definition by methods for working with human readable text.
    A TagTextField does not store binary data.
    Author:
    Raphaï¿½l Slinckx
